description: When attempting to run a program, a compile/runtime error is encountered with the endswith function that states "TypeError: endswith() takes at least 2 arguments (1 given)". The problem is that the program is attempting to use the endswith function to check if
code:
# Program to demonstrate compile/runtime error

# Define a list of strings
strings = ["Hello", "World", "Goodbye", "Earth"]

# Attempt to use the endswith function
for s in strings:
  if s.endswith
